MemoryInfobox.name: Keep On Deserting
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Spartan soldiers were deserting their posts, but an Athens|Athenian spy feared that they would return and strengthen the phalanx.'

General_Description: '''Keep On Deserting''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra was asked by an [[Athens|Athenian]] spy to help weaken [[Sparta]]'s position in the region.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''Where there is passion, reason is gone. For [[Leda (mythology)|Leda]] truly loved her [[Zeus|swan]].''
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
